name: CoreSmartHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on Welcome”
”Alexa, turn on Goodbye”
”Alexa, turn on Dinner”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Ask Alexa to control your scenes configured with Core Touch Panels. 

Try saying
"Alexa, turn on Goodbye"
"Alexa, turn on Welcome"
"Alexa, turn on Dinner"

Getting Started

1. To add the Core Smart Home Skill to Alexa go to the Alexa mobile app. Under Skills, search for “Core Smart Home”, Select “Core Smart Home” and tap “ENABLE”.
2. You will be prompted to sign in to the Core login page to link your Core account to Alexa.
3. Next select the device you’d like Alexa to control. 
4. Finally, tap “done” and then tap “DISCOVER DEVICES” or ask Alexa to “Discover Devices”. This can take up to 20 seconds.

Control your comfortable, economical, safe, prestigious home with a touch.

*Note: With Alexa, for now, you can only control the scenes you have defined in the Core Touch panel.

Supported devices:
http://core.com.tr/touch-panels/
